channel.title: Stoping animation

item.title: Stoping animation
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Ok, I left this for about a month or two and haven’t done absolutely ANY programing since then so im kind of clueless here.

I want to stop the animation after a short period of time so i did this.

		for(int i=1; i<5; i++){
		anim(831);
		}

But the termination integer never initialized… I have no clue what went wrong.

I also use a do-while statement… That fail as well.

		int digSec = 0;
		do{
		   anim(831);
		   digSec++;
		} while (digSec <= 5);

Read full topic
